author: Ground News
title: Ground News - 'He's going to do an excellent job': An Alberta pup heads to Ukraine to aid in the war effort
text: 'He's going to do an excellent job': An Alberta pup heads to Ukraine to aid in the war effort Torch, a four-year-old Belgian Malinois, will be joining the Ukraine National Guard to help sniff out explosives in cargo. The working dog was raised by Alberta K9, a company specializing in breeding and training working dogs for public safety roles. "Oppenheimer," a solemn three-hour biopic that became an unlikely billion-dollar box-office sensation, was crowned best picture at a 96th Academy Awards.
